There were 4 other sightings in Portland on or around July 5th 2012
Summary: small star-like object jetting across sky
divs: sighting detailson july 5th, 2012 i was star gazing, as i usually do from sunset with occasional breaks until around 4-430 a.m., after my last and final break of the night i decided to go into our garage and grab a soda before heading in for the night,(garage is about 15-20 feet from our back door and this is where i sit to gaze, perfect vantage point for rising moon and orions belt)after coming back out from the garage and locking the door behind me i flicked the garage light off and something bright caught my attention through my peripherals, i looked up and there was a star-like light, very high in the night sky, jetting overhead, now, i live fairly close to an airport, so i know exactly what a plane looks, and sounds like, i can hear them coming for miles in advance, this was 3 in the morning and absolute silence. i ran inside and looked up any recent meteor showers or comets and none were supposed to happen until the 28th and 29th of this month, still a few weeks away by the way. then curiously i looked into what they would look like maybe this was a stray( i know wishful thinking) and the website said if it was a comet or meteor it would have a very clear tail and would odbviously be a comet\meteor. no trail\tail\emissions or anything. now that was the only one that i saw that night. the following night i was very eager to get back out and see if i couldnt spot another with just dumb luck or what have you, that night, july 6th 2012, from approx. 12 midnight to around 330 a.m. me and my 18 year old sister witnessed a total of 3 together, same shape, same brightness,speed, everything. the 3 werent together and were at different times, coming from different locations, but ineveitably traveling towardds the same area of the sky(big dipper region). now, the following night, july 7th 2012 is when i became absolutely convinced these objects were not comets\meteors. my sister also became very intrigued and joined me outside for a couple hours. after seeing about 3 or 4 more doing the exact same things as all the others the previous nights, my sister says, "oh my god, joe look at that!" i got up and looked where she was looking and i saw two star-like objects, obviously very high in the sky, seperated by small space but not seperate crafts, it was very clearly a cigar shaped craft\object. that being the 5th object that night i witnessed a total of 4 more. finally, last night, july 8th, 2012, i witnessed 4 more. this time it was a family event! 18 year old sister, 28 year old sister, 33 year old brother in law, 10 year old niece, and myself all witnessed a distant, star-like object jetting across the sky completely silent, only this time, once it got to a certain point in the sky, it stopped, effortlessly, and began to get so bright that my sisters thought whatever it was had exploded! after about 10-15 seconds of tremendous brightness, it dimmed back down and continued traveling in the same direction. this is only over the span of 4 nights but you better believe ill be back out there every night im able to and i strongly believe ill be seeing many more. from july 5th 2012 to july 8th 2012 i witnessed 15 total crafts\objects and this is just the beginning. ufo's or whatever you wanna call 'em, love the nw! i didnt know where else to post this but i had to get it out, i really really hope more people in portland have been seeing this and come forward, its time to open our eyes and stop denying what these are, instead of trying to dismiss 'em, accept it for what it is. thanks guys!
